title: LA28 Federal Task Force Reports (EO 14125) - DOJ (Federal Bureau of Investigation)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

All finalized memoranda, policy directives, and inter-agency agreements (MOUs) created or submitted by the Department of Justice in compliance with Executive Order 14125.

Please provide the DOJ’s report to the White House Task Force (mandated by Section 2(g)) regarding the establishment of the "single chain of command" for security operations and any assessments regarding the "visa processing and credentialing" of foreign nationals as it pertains to Olympic security.

Pursuant to the FOIA Improvement Act of 2016, if the Department intends to withhold any information, please provide a specific explanation of the foreseeable harm that would result from the release of the withheld material.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Anna Massoglia

title: LA28 Federal Task Force Reports (EO 14125) - DOJ (Department of Justice, National Security Division)

communications.communication:

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.
